StartAntiAltAsync(ulong, int, PunishmentAction, int, ulong?)

Starts the anti-alt protection for a guild.

Declaration
public Task StartAntiAltAsync(ulong guildId, int minAgeMinutes, PunishmentAction action, int actionDurationMinutes = 0, ulong? roleId = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The ID of the guild to start the protection for.
int minAgeMinutes

The minimum age of an account to not be considered an alt.
PunishmentAction action

The punishment action to be applied when the protection is triggered.
int actionDurationMinutes

The duration of the punishment, if applicable.
ulong? roleId

The ID of the role to be added, if applicable.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

StartAntiRaidAsync(ulong, int, int, PunishmentAction, int)

Starts the anti-raid protection for a guild.

Declaration
public Task<AntiRaidStats?> StartAntiRaidAsync(ulong guildId, int userThreshold, int seconds, PunishmentAction action, int minutesDuration)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The ID of the guild to start the protection for.
int userThreshold

The number of users that triggers the anti-raid protection.
int seconds

The time period in seconds in which the user threshold must be reached to trigger the protection.
PunishmentAction action

The punishment action to be applied when the protection is triggered.
int minutesDuration

The duration of the punishment, if applicable.
Returns
Type Description
Task<AntiRaidStats>

A task that represents the asynchronous operation and contains the anti-raid stats if the protection was successfully started.
